sentence.Network_en: So the house is falling apart and the vineyard makes undrinkable wine?
sentence.Network_cn: 那么,房子是塌的葡萄园酿难喝的酒?

sentence.Network_en: Also, dirty water from factories goes into rivers and makes it undrinkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 同样的, 工厂排出到河里的废水也使得水无法饮用.

sentence.Network_en: Flawed wines to avoid at all costs. Practically undrinkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 有缺陷的酒,多少钱也不要买. 简直不能喝.
